text: A te iz vashikh zhen, kotoryye uzhe otchayalis' v mesyachnykh - yesli vy somnevayetes', to ikh srok - tri mesyatsa, kak i dlya tekh, u kotorykh yeshche ne bylo mesyachnykh; a u kotorykh nosha - ikh srok , chtoby oni slozhili svoyu noshu. Kto boitsya Allakha, tomu On ustroit v Svoyem dele legkost'
